text: @realDonaldTrump @GoyaFoods Great leader.   Golf and tweet  as our country ranks at the bottom of the heap for coronavirus cases and deaths.    You are incredibly  in capable of running a Lemonade stand, Let alone our country.    November can’t come soon enough Mr. dictator
